item.text: The Lord spoke to Moses and Aaron:

“<st data-num="03588" class="">When</st> <st data-num="0120" class="">someone</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">has</st><n id="1" /> a <st data-num="07613" class="">swelling</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="05597" class="">scab</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="0934" class="">bright spot</st><n id="4" /> on the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st> of his <st data-num="01320" class="">body</st><n id="5" /> that may <st data-num="01961" class="">become</st> a <st data-num="06883" class="">diseased</st> <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st>,<n id="6" /> he must be <st data-num="0935" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0175" class="">Aaron</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> of his <st data-num="01121" class="">sons</st>, the <st data-num="03548" class="">priests</st>.<n id="7" />

The priest must then examine the infection on the skin of the body, and if the hair in the infection has turned white and the infection appears to be deeper than the skin of the body, then it is a diseased infection, so when the priest examines it, he must pronounce the person unclean.

“If it is a white bright spot on the skin of his body, but it does not appear to be deeper than the skin, and the hair has not turned white, then the priest is to quarantine the person with the infection for seven days.

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> must then <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> it on the <st data-num="07637" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>, and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st>,<n id="1" /> as far as he can <st data-num="05869" class="">see</st>, the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> has <st data-num="05975" class="">stayed the same</st><n id="2" /> and has <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06581" class="">spread</st> on the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st>,<n id="3" /> then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="05462" class="">quarantine</st> the person for <st data-num="08145" class="">another</st> <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>.<n id="4" />

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> must then <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> it <st data-num="08145" class="">again</st> on the <st data-num="07637" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> has <st data-num="03544" class="">faded</st> and has <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06581" class="">spread</st> on the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st>, then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="02891" class="">pronounce</st> the person <st data-num="02891" class="">clean</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">It</st> is a <st data-num="04556" class="">scab</st>,<n id="4" /> so he must <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st><n id="5" /> and <st data-num="02891" class="">be clean</st>.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st>, however, the <st data-num="04556" class="">scab</st> is <st data-num="06581" class="">spreading</st> <st data-num="06581" class="">further</st><n id="1" /> on the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> he has <st data-num="07200" class="">shown</st> himself <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> for his <st data-num="02893" class="">purification</st>, then he must <st data-num="07200" class="">show</st> himself <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> a <st data-num="08145" class="">second time</st>.
The priest must then examine it, and if the scab has spread on the skin, then the priest is to pronounce the person unclean. It is a disease.
“When someone has a diseased infection, he must be brought to the priest.

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> will then <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> it,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="2" /> a <st data-num="03836" class="">white</st> <st data-num="07613" class="">swelling</st> is on the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> has <st data-num="02015" class="">turned</st> the <st data-num="08181" class="">hair</st> <st data-num="03836" class="">white</st>, and there is <st data-num="04241 02416">raw</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">flesh</st> in the <st data-num="07613" class="">swelling</st>,<n id="3" />

<st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is a <st data-num="03462" class="">chronic</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="06883" class="">disease</st> on the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st> of his <st data-num="01320" class="">body</st>,<n id="2" /> so the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="02930" class="">pronounce</st> him <st data-num="02930" class="">unclean</st>.<n id="3" /> The priest<n id="4" /> must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> merely <st data-num="05462" class="">quarantine</st> him, <st data-num="03588" class="">for</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st>, however, the <st data-num="06883" class="">disease</st> <st data-num="06524" class="">breaks</st> <st data-num="06524" class="">out</st><n id="1" /> on the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st> so that the <st data-num="06883" class="">disease</st> <st data-num="03680" class="">covers</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st> of the person with the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st><n id="2" /> from his <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> his <st data-num="07272" class="">feet</st>, <st data-num="03605 04758">as far as</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> can <st data-num="05869" class="">see</st>,<n id="3" />

the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> must then <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> it,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="06883" class="">disease</st> <st data-num="03680" class="">covers</st> his <st data-num="03605" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">body</st>, he is to <st data-num="02891" class="">pronounce</st> the person with the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> <st data-num="02891" class="">clean</st>.<n id="3" /> He has <st data-num="02015" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03836" class="">white</st>, so <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is <st data-num="02889" class="">clean</st>.<n id="4" />

But <st data-num="03117" class="">whenever</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">raw</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">appears</st> in it,<n id="1" /> he will <st data-num="02930">be unclean</st>,

so the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> the <st data-num="02416" class="">raw</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">flesh</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02930" class="">pronounce</st> him <st data-num="02930" class="">unclean</st><n id="2" />—<st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is <st data-num="06883" class="">diseased</st>.

<st data-num="03588" class="">If</st>, <st data-num="0176" class="">however</st>,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="02416" class="">raw</st> <st data-num="01320" class="">flesh</st> <st data-num="07725" class="">once again</st> <st data-num="02015" class="">turns</st> <st data-num="03836" class="">white</st>,<n id="2" /> then he must <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>.
The priest will then examine it, and if the infection has turned white, the priest is to pronounce the person with the infection clean—he is clean.
“When someone’s body has a boil on its skin and it heals,

and in the <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> of the <st data-num="07822" class="">boil</st> there <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="03836" class="">white</st> <st data-num="07613" class="">swelling</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> a <st data-num="0125" class="">reddish</st> <st data-num="03836" class="">white</st> <st data-num="0934" class="">bright spot</st>, he must <st data-num="07200" class="">show</st> himself <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>.<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> will then <st data-num="02009" class="">examine</st> it,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="2" /> it <st data-num="04758" class="">appears</st> to be <st data-num="08217" class="">deeper</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st><n id="3" /> and its <st data-num="08181" class="">hair</st> has <st data-num="02015" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="03836" class="">white</st>, then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="02930" class="">pronounce</st> the person <st data-num="02930" class="">unclean</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">It</st> is a <st data-num="06883" class="">diseased</st> <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> that has <st data-num="06524" class="">broken out</st> in the <st data-num="07822" class="">boil</st>.<n id="5" />

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st>, however,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">examines</st> it, and<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0369" class="">there is no</st> <st data-num="03836" class="">white</st> <st data-num="08181" class="">hair</st> in it, <st data-num="0369" class="">it is not</st> <st data-num="08217" class="">deeper</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st>, and <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> has <st data-num="03544" class="">faded</st>, then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="05462" class="">quarantine</st> him for <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>.<n id="3" />

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st><n id="1" /> it is <st data-num="06581" class="">spreading</st> <st data-num="06581" class="">farther</st><n id="2" /> on the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st>, then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="02930" class="">pronounce</st> him <st data-num="02930" class="">unclean</st>.<n id="3" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">It</st> is an <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st>.
But if the bright spot stays in its place and has not spread, it is the scar of the boil, so the priest is to pronounce him clean.
“When a body has a burn on its skin and the raw area of the burn becomes a reddish white or white bright spot,

the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> must <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> it,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="08181" class="">hair</st> has <st data-num="02015" class="">turned</st> <st data-num="03836" class="">white</st> in the <st data-num="0934" class="">bright spot</st> and it <st data-num="04758" class="">appears</st> to be <st data-num="06013" class="">deeper</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is a <st data-num="06883" class="">disease</st> that has <st data-num="06524" class="">broken out</st> in the <st data-num="04348" class="">burn</st>.<n id="4" /> The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="02930" class="">pronounce</st> the person <st data-num="02930" class="">unclean</st>.<n id="5" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">It</st> is a <st data-num="06883" class="">diseased</st> <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st>.<n id="6" />

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st>, however,<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">examines</st> it and<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0369" class="">there is no</st> <st data-num="03836" class="">white</st> <st data-num="08181" class="">hair</st> in the <st data-num="0934" class="">bright spot</st>, <st data-num="0369" class="">it is not</st> <st data-num="08217" class="">deeper</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st>,<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> has <st data-num="03544" class="">faded</st>, then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="05462" class="">quarantine</st> him for <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>.<n id="4" />

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> must then <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> it on the <st data-num="07637" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>, and <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> it is <st data-num="06581" class="">spreading</st> <st data-num="06581" class="">further</st><n id="1" /> on the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st>, then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="02930" class="">pronounce</st> him <st data-num="02930" class="">unclean</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">It</st> is a <st data-num="06883" class="">diseased</st> <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st>.<n id="2" />

But if the bright spot stays in its place, has not spread on the skin, and it has faded, then it is the swelling of the burn, so the priest is to pronounce him clean, because it is the scar of the burn.
“When a man or a woman has an infection on the head or in the beard,

the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="2" /> it <st data-num="04758" class="">appears</st> to be <st data-num="06013" class="">deeper</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st><n id="3" /> and the <st data-num="08181" class="">hair</st> in it is <st data-num="06669" class="">reddish yellow</st> and <st data-num="01851" class="">thin</st>, then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="02930" class="">pronounce</st> the person <st data-num="02930" class="">unclean</st>.<n id="4" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">It</st> is <st data-num="05424" class="">scall</st>,<n id="5" /> a <st data-num="06883" class="">disease</st> of the <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="02206" class="">beard</st>.<n id="6" />

But <st data-num="03588" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">examines</st> the <st data-num="05424" class="">scall</st> <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> and it does <st data-num="0369" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04758" class="">appear</st> to be <st data-num="06013" class="">deeper</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st>,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="0369" class="">there is no</st> <st data-num="07838" class="">black</st> <st data-num="08181" class="">hair</st> in it, then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="05462" class="">quarantine</st> the person with the <st data-num="05424" class="">scall</st> <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> for <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>.<n id="2" />

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> must then <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> on the <st data-num="07637" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>, and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05424" class="">scall</st> has <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06581" class="">spread</st>, there <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="06669" class="">reddish yellow</st> <st data-num="08181" class="">hair</st> in it, and the <st data-num="05424" class="">scall</st> does <st data-num="0369" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04758" class="">appear</st> to be <st data-num="06013" class="">deeper</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st>,<n id="2" />

then the individual is to <st data-num="01548" class="">shave</st> himself,<n id="1" /> but he must <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01548" class="">shave</st> the area affected by the <st data-num="05424" class="">scall</st>,<n id="2" /> and the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="05462" class="">quarantine</st> the person with the <st data-num="05424" class="">scall</st> for <st data-num="08145" class="">another</st> <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>.<n id="3" />

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> must then <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> the <st data-num="05424" class="">scall</st> on the <st data-num="07637" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>, and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05424" class="">scall</st> has <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06581" class="">spread</st> on the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st> and it does <st data-num="0369" class="">not</st> <st data-num="04758" class="">appear</st> to be <st data-num="06013" class="">deeper</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">than</st> the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st>,<n id="2" /> then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="02891" class="">pronounce</st> him <st data-num="02891" class="">clean</st>.<n id="3" /> So he is to <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st> and <st data-num="02891" class="">be clean</st>.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st>, however, the <st data-num="05424" class="">scall</st> <st data-num="06581" class="">spreads</st> <st data-num="06581" class="">further</st><n id="1" /> on the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> his <st data-num="02893" class="">purification</st>,

then the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> it, and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05424" class="">scall</st> has <st data-num="06581" class="">spread</st> on the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st>, the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> to <st data-num="01239" class="">search</st> further for <st data-num="06669" class="">reddish yellow</st> <st data-num="08181" class="">hair</st>.<n id="2" /> The <st data-num="01931" class="">person</st><n id="3" /> is <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st>.
If, as far as the priest can see, the scall has stayed the same and black hair has sprouted in it, the scall has been healed; the person is clean. So the priest is to pronounce him clean.
“When a man or a woman has bright spots—white bright spots—on the skin of their body,
the priest is to examine them, and if the bright spots on the skin of their body are faded white, it is a harmless rash that has broken out on the skin. The person is clean.
“When a man’s head is bare so that he is balding in back, he is clean.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> his <st data-num="07218" class="">head</st> <st data-num="04803" class="">is bare</st> on the <st data-num="06285 06440">forehead</st><n id="1" /> so that <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is <st data-num="01371" class="">balding in front</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is <st data-num="02889" class="">clean</st>.

But <st data-num="03588" class="">if</st> there <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> a <st data-num="0125" class="">reddish</st> <st data-num="03836" class="">white</st> <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> in the <st data-num="07146" class="">back</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="01372" class="">front</st> bald area, <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is a <st data-num="06883" class="">disease</st> <st data-num="06524" class="">breaking out</st> in his <st data-num="07146" class="">back</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="01372">front</st> bald area.

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> it,<n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="07613" class="">swelling</st> of the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> is <st data-num="0125" class="">reddish</st> <st data-num="03836" class="">white</st> in the <st data-num="07146" class="">back</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="01372" class="">front</st> bald area like the <st data-num="04758" class="">appearance</st> of a <st data-num="06883" class="">disease</st> on the <st data-num="05785" class="">skin</st> of the <st data-num="01320" class="">body</st>,<n id="3" />
he is a diseased man. He is unclean. The priest must surely pronounce him unclean because of his infection on his head.
“As for the diseased person who has the infection, his clothes must be torn, the hair of his head must be unbound, he must cover his mustache, and he must call out ‘Unclean! Unclean!’
The whole time he has the infection he will be continually unclean. He must live in isolation, and his place of residence must be outside the camp.
“When a garment has a diseased infection in it, whether a wool or linen garment,

if the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st><n id="1" /> in the <st data-num="0899" class="">garment</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="05785" class="">leather</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="08359" class="">warp</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="06154" class="">woof</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">article</st> of <st data-num="05785" class="">leather</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">is</st> <st data-num="03422" class="">yellowish green</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="0125" class="">reddish</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is a <st data-num="06883" class="">diseased</st> <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st>, and it must be <st data-num="07200" class="">shown</st> to the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st>.

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> and then <st data-num="05462" class="">quarantine</st> the article with the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> for <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>.<n id="1" />

He must then <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> on the <st data-num="07637" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st>. <st data-num="03588" class="">If</st> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> has <st data-num="06581" class="">spread</st> in the <st data-num="0899" class="">garment</st>, <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> in the <st data-num="08359" class="">warp</st>, <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> in the <st data-num="06154" class="">woof</st>, <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> in the <st data-num="05785" class="">leather</st>—<st data-num="03605" class="">whatever</st> the <st data-num="04399" class="">article</st> into <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> the <st data-num="05785" class="">leather</st> was <st data-num="06213" class="">made</st><n id="1" />—the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> is a <st data-num="03992" class="">malignant</st> <st data-num="06883" class="">disease</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">It</st> is <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st>.

He must <st data-num="08313" class="">burn</st> the <st data-num="0899" class="">garment</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="08359" class="">warp</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="06154" class="">woof</st>, whether <st data-num="06785" class="">wool</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="06593" class="">linen</st>, <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">article</st> of <st data-num="05785" class="">leather</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">which</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">has</st> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> in it. <st data-num="03588" class="">Because</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is a <st data-num="03992" class="">malignant</st> <st data-num="06883" class="">disease</st> it must be <st data-num="08313" class="">burned up</st> in the <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>.

But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">examines</st> it and<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> has <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06581" class="">spread</st> in the <st data-num="0899" class="">garment</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> in the <st data-num="08359" class="">warp</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> in the <st data-num="06154" class="">woof</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> in <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">article</st> of <st data-num="05785" class="">leather</st>,

the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> is to <st data-num="06680" class="">command</st> that they <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whatever</st> has the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> and <st data-num="05462" class="">quarantine</st> it for <st data-num="08145" class="">another</st> <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st>.<n id="1" />

The <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> must then <st data-num="07200" class="">examine</st> it <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> has been <st data-num="03526" class="">washed out</st>, and <st data-num="02009" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> has <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="02015" class="">changed</st> its <st data-num="05869" class="">appearance</st><n id="2" /> even though the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> has <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="06581" class="">spread</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st>. You must <st data-num="08313" class="">burn</st> it <st data-num="08313" class="">up</st> in the <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>. <st data-num="01931" class="">It</st> is a <st data-num="06356" class="">fungus</st>, whether on the <st data-num="07146" class="">back side</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="01372" class="">front side</st> of the article.<n id="3" />

But <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> has <st data-num="07200" class="">examined</st> it and<n id="1" /> the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> has <st data-num="03544" class="">faded</st> <st data-num="0310" class="">after</st> it has been <st data-num="03526" class="">washed</st>, he is to <st data-num="07167" class="">tear</st> it <st data-num="07167" class="">out</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">of</st><n id="2" /> the <st data-num="0899" class="">garment</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="05785" class="">leather</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="08359" class="">warp</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="06154" class="">woof</st>.

Then <st data-num="0518" class="">if</st><n id="1" /> it still <st data-num="07200" class="">appears</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">again</st> in the <st data-num="0899" class="">garment</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="08359" class="">warp</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> the <st data-num="06154" class="">woof</st>, <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> in <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">article</st> of <st data-num="05785" class="">leather</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> is an <st data-num="06524" class="">outbreak</st>. <st data-num="0834" class="">Whatever</st> has the <st data-num="05061" class="">infection</st> in it you must <st data-num="08313" class="">burn up</st> in the <st data-num="0784" class="">fire</st>.
But the garment or the warp or the woof or any article of leather which you wash and infection disappears from it is to be washed a second time, and it will be clean.”
This is the law of the diseased infection in the garment of wool or linen, or the warp or woof, or any article of leather, for pronouncing it clean or unclean.
